issue.message: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE no longer provides write access when targeting Android 10, unless you use `requestLegacyExternalStorage`
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.

To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.

To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.

Use of this function is discouraged because resource reflection makes it harder to perform build optimizations and compile-time verification of code. It is much more efficient to retrieve resources by identifier (e.g. `R.foo.bar`) than by name (e.g. `getIdentifier("bar", "foo", null)`).

Use of this function is discouraged because resource reflection makes it harder to perform build optimizations and compile-time verification of code. It is much more efficient to retrieve resources by identifier (e.g. `R.foo.bar`) than by name (e.g. `getIdentifier("bar", "foo", null)`).

This intent could be coming from an untrusted source. It is later launched by an unprotected component org.microg.gms.checkin.CheckinService. You could either make the component org.microg.gms.checkin.CheckinService protected; or sanitize this intent using androidx.core.content.IntentSanitizer.

Set `android:baselineAligned="false"` on this element for better performance
Nested weights are bad for performance

issue.errorLine1: <string name="pref_auto_create_player_intro">زمانی که بازی میکنید، باید از حساب بازی های پلی استفاده کنید تا وارد شوید و عملکردهای مربوط به بازی را ضبط کنید، مانند دستاورد ها، جدول برترین ها، آرشیو ها و ... . پس از غیرفعال سازی، حساب های گوگل که به حساب بازی های پلی وصل نیستند به طور خودکار ثبت نخواهند شد، و بازی قادر به ورود و اجرا نخواهد بود.</string>

issue.message: Buttons in button bars should be borderless; use `style="?android:attr/buttonBarButtonStyle"` (and `?android:attr/buttonBarStyle` on the parent)
Buttons in button bars should be borderless; use `style="?android:attr/buttonBarButtonStyle"` (and `?android:attr/buttonBarStyle` on the parent)
Custom view `PlusOneButtonImpl` is missing constructor used by tools: `(Context)` or `(Context,AttributeSet)` or `(Context,AttributeSet,int)`
Hardcoded string "Can't load nearby places.", should use `@string` resource
`@id/leaderboard_player_rank` can overlap `@id/leaderboard_player_name` if @id/leaderboard_player_name, @id/leaderboard_player_rank grow due to localized text expansion
`@id/next_button` can overlap `@id/back_button` if @id/back_button, @id/next_button grow due to localized text expansion
When you define `paddingStart` you should probably also define `paddingEnd` for right-to-left symmetry
When you define `paddingStart` you should probably also define `paddingEnd` for right-to-left symmetry
When you define `paddingStart` you should probably also define `paddingEnd` for right-to-left symmetry
When you define `paddingEnd` you should probably also define `paddingStart` for right-to-left symmetry
When you define `paddingLeft` you should probably also define `paddingRight` for right-to-left symmetry
When you define `paddingLeft` you should probably also define `paddingRight` for right-to-left symmetry
Consider replacing `android:paddingLeft` with `android:paddingStart="18dp"` to better support right-to-left layouts
Consider replacing `android:paddingLeft` with `android:paddingStart="8.0dip"` to better support right-to-left layouts
The project references RTL attributes, but does not explicitly enable or disable RTL support with `android:supportsRtl` in the manifest
